H0.text: In which building is Napoleon Bonaparte buried. Arc de Triomphe

H1.text: In which building is Napoleon Bonaparte buried. Notre-Dame Cathedral

H2.text: In which building is Napoleon Bonaparte buried. Palace of Versailles

H3.text: In which building is Napoleon Bonaparte buried. Invalides

A4.text: Napoleon's remains were kept in the Saint Jerome (southwestern) chapel of the Dome church for more than two decades until his final resting place, a tomb made of red quartzite and resting on a green granite base, was finished in 1861.

A5.text: The Tomb of Napoleon is found within the Church of the Dome.
